main event: A witness reported observing a large, pancake-shaped object emitting a humming sound while walking in a rural area near Florence, Massachusetts in 1954.
interesting points: The witness described the object as being about 30 ft. in diameter and a dull metallic color., The incident occurred in a hilly and wooded area, enhancing the mystery of the sighting., The witness's grandmother also reported seeing strange lights in the same location a few days prior., The sighting was reported three years later, leading to questions about the accuracy and details., The report was part of Project Blue Book, which was established to investigate UFO sightings by the U.S. Air Force.
sighted object: a pancake-shaped, large unidentified flying object
witness description: The main witness was a young adult female accompanied by her cousin during the sighting.
